extendedInfo.description: Conscience+ is a new Decision Making Aidâ¢ designed by psychologist and behavioral economist Dan Ariely, bestselling author of Predictably Irrational, The Upside of Irrationality, and the soon to be released The Honest Truth about Dishonesty.Conscience+ is here to help you through lifeâs most perplexing moral dilemmas. Based on the latest insights about human decision making, Conscience+ gives you the excuses you need to justify doing what you want to do -- whether it is something good you aspire to, OR something more shady and less moral. Think of Conscience+ as providing both an angel and a devil, sitting on your shoulder and available for advice at the flip of a switch.Conscience+ helps with:- turning away the dessert menu - splurging on a new electronic gadget- staying faithful to your romantic partner- padding your expense report on your bossâs dime- lying on your college application- and much, much more!Disclaimer: We donât really want you to make immoral decisions, so please limit your use of Conscience+ in justifying bad behavior.

reviews.title: Fun little app
reviews.comment: And useful too! I used it to stick to my diet today. :)  What I miss in the app: - support for landscape mode when adding excuses - ability to rearrange/change sort order of excuses - ability to delete default excuses
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not useful or fun
reviews.comment: The arguments in here are generic; I was hoping for something unique that I hadn\'t heard before. Not really helpful or novel. Might be fun if some of the excuses were funny, but they aren\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is neat
reviews.comment: This app is more fun than useful. I feel like a drinking game that uses this app should/will be invented!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decision Support tool indeed
reviews.comment: Very interesting list of excuses! I wonder if it helps me to do sports more frequently?!
reviews.author: A Google User
